experience: You and Erin both know Dan Olson, Steve Getman, and 2 others
Recently in a job interview, I was asked what I enjoyed doing outside of work.
I was caught offguard- As someone currently interviewing, this was the FIRST time someone asked about me as a person, not just my work history.
This question resulted in a fun, casual conversation about my passion for dodgeball and a webcomic series I've been working on for months.
As a candidate, this experience only reinforced my decision to apply- Any company that cares about me as a person and values my hobbies outside of work is a company I want to be a part of.

summary: An energetic, dependable and ambitious Senior Project Manager/Producer with more than 13+ years of agency experience. Demonstrates well-refined project management, negotiation and problem solving skills. Highly collaborative with the ability to lead teams and to manage projects independently. Thrives under pressure with a unique ability to always remain calm and collected, all while maintaining a sense of humor.Specialties:• Project Management • Successfully manage: TV, OOH, Print, POS, websites, email blasts, online banners, packaging, events, social• Team Leader• Cross-team communication• Client relations• Critical thinking• Problem solving• Mobile app development• Managing teams internationally and domestically • Organization and Optimization• Able to adapt in a constantly changing industry• Excellent verbal and written communication skills• Expresses a “can-do” attitude and a positive outlook on lifeErin is currently seeking a Director of PM position or as a Creative Services/Resource Manager.
